amendment.description: An amendment numbered 81 printed in Part A of House Report 115-650 to require a study/assessment and data collection of the air cargo traffic in the Caribbean region.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gonzalez-Colon (PR) amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A019) offered by Miss Gonzalez-Colon (PR).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gonzalez-Colon (PR) amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
